document_data.name: Ghereg
document_data.mainbody: '''Ghereg''' was a [[ogre]] living in [[Kuldahar Pass]] during the 11{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The large ogre wore silver jerkins and fought with a [[morning star]].
document_data.Personality: Ghereg was not a mean ogre, but did suffer from horrendous headaches.
document_data.History: In [[Eleint]] of the {{YearlinkName|1281}}, Ghereg was drawn to Kuldahar Pass by some unknown calling and met a group of mercenaries. In pain and anguish, the ogre told the adventurers of his headaches.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: One rumor was the company told Ghereg how to cure his ailment, possibly with the help of [[Arundel]]. The ogre was to pick red and purple [[frostberry|frostberries]], mash them, and combine them with boiled [[tundra grass]].
